column2: 'Grate the carrot and thinly slice the apple and red onion.'
In a large bowl, combine shredded red cabbage, grated carrot, sliced apple,and sliced red onion.'
In a small bowl, whisk together apple cider vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.'
'Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.'
